mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Serverless data integration from Amazon for ETL, ELT, replication, batch and stream processing. Simplifies data integration by modernizing ETL with automatic provisioning and worker management. Goals: faster and cheaper data preparation for ML and analytics.
